name: Cupid Corp.
description:
Cupid.Corp is a survivial game where you play as Cupid and try to fix the broken hearts of others before Valentine's day arrives. Cupid doesn't enjoy his job but it pays the bills. Play day by day or go to infinite mode to see how far you last.

Programmers: Samuel Beatson, Edward Tavarez

Level Design: Brandon Perez

Illustration: Katie Drescher

Sound Design: Jay Lindo
